Description: Samick RL-4 with Seymore-Duncan designed humbuckers. Includes hard case. This is an outstanding guitar. This guitar is in perfect condition, I have purchased a new guitar and this guitar is now surplus. Buyer will pay actual cost of shipping and insurance. The ROYALE™ addresses the performance shortcomings of this great design. The sides and the center block are made from one piece of wood, rather than two sides and the center block. This creates a more rigid structure to mount the neck, top, and back into. The result is uncommon attack and sustain, without sacrificing the rich, full tone. It’s more like a solid body with incredible tone and warmth or fullness. The compact head stock size reduces the tendency to resonate and steal energy from the string. Dual humbucking pickups insure balanced tone, clarity, and power. RL 4 FEATURES: • Single cutaway semi hollow body • Bound, arched mahogany top • Bound Mahogany set neck • Nut width 1 5/8” • Rosewood fingerboard (12” radius) • Dot inlay • 22 fret, 24 ¾” scale • Gold hardware • Grover™ A102C, 14:1 ratio tuners • Stop tailpiece with adjustable bridge • Dual humbucker pickups • 2 volume, 2 tone controls • 3-way selector switch
Title: Samick RL-4 Guitar
